title: Toxicity In CHAMP SELECT IN EVERY GAME
body:
I've been in Silver V for a few months now and over the months there has been an increasing amount of toxicity BEFORE the game starts. one bad ban and i have to watch 4 members of my team flame things i wouldn't expect 20 years olds to say.
Is there a way to access my chat log feed? So i could attach photos of some of it... Its really getting beyond me. I end up losing 2/3's of my games due to this early toxicity.

replies.body:
Frankly i am sick to death of all the troll picks.
So many champs are obviously bad picks, off meta or never meta or simply don't fit the team.

This should not be happening in ranked period. I don't care what people type in chat, it's what they do that frustrates me. Riot needs to start banning toxic players from ranked.
